about_the_game:
Heroes of the Nam Battlepack 2

Heroes of the Nam Battlepack 2 brings the award-winning Lock ’n Load Tactical Series to the war in Vietnam. This squad-level game, with its fast-paced, intense impulse system, drops you right into the middle of furious jungle firefights and all-out, building-to-building assaults.



Heroes of the Nam Battlepack 2 brings the forces from the Army of the Republic of Vietnam (ARVN), the United States Army and Marines, as well as their valiant Anzac allies from Australia and New Zealand, take on determined enemies from the North Vietnamese Army (NVA) and the unpredictable Viet Cong (VC). Heroes of the Nam Battle Pack 2 includes 11 scenarios, bringing to life powerfully armed Squads are at the vanguard of all actions, spurred on by daring Leaders and other unique individuals such as Snipers, Medics, Corpsmen, Chaplains, Advisors and, of course, Heroes, whose unique skills and sudden appearance can alter the tide of any battle. Helicopters, tanks, and armored personnel carriers (APCs) also join the fight. Test your mettle in 11 action-packed scenarios. Only the heroic will be victorious.



Scenarios Included

  • The Cavalry
  • Suoi Chau Pha
  • Hill 823
  • Prelude to Lang Vei
  • Amgrunts
  • Liberation of Ba Ria
  • The Village
  • Streets of Sorrow
  • River of Perfume
  • Tread Heads
  • Serious Firepower
